subject: IES Reader Wave 3: Mobile UX improvements and styling updates - All code changes committed
body: All code changes related to Text Selection -> Note Integration styling, General Mobile UX (Touch Target Sizing), and CSS class refactoring, including additional component updates from the design system overhaul and swipe-to-delete implementation, have been committed to feature/ies-reader-enhancement. The worktree is clean. Manual mobile testing is now required. Please refer to previous instructions for testing. Awaiting user feedback.
